name: Mike S
text: A whole lot better than they used to be. And just in time too. We were very disappointed in one of their compedators, so we went back to Round Table. We were pleasantly surprised.  The remodel looks great. The service was good. The pizza was good. No complaints. I would definitely return.

name: Mike Montano
text: I really miss our Roundtable. Where else can you say, our rehearsal dinner was at RTP Clubhouse because our original wedding plan and venue had to change, so did our rehearsal dinner plans. You guys are amazing, and glad to hear that everyone is safe.

name: brad202684
text: I used to deliver food and supplies to Round Table Paradise for a couple years, I hope everyone whoâ€™s worked here past and present are safe and accounted for during the #CampFire

name: Gary H
text: Most excellent service by a pigtailed waitress who chatted us up while serving us some pretty tasty micro-brews. â€¦More

name: Jennifer Emlaw
text: Continue to be disappointed here. Moved across the street a year ago and ordered a lot. Lately I keep telling myself I'm not coming here anymore.  Tired of spending lots of money to be disappointed.  Today's order was delivery.  Pizza was â€¦More

name: Trevor Gridley
text: The pizza is great, but if the banquet room is reserved there isn't enough seating for people who can't sit in barstools. They really don't have the space in their current location for the layout they have created.

name: Calin Moldovan
text: Pizza is good, staff is friendly, price is steep.

name: Rebecca Gangwer
text: Ordered a pizza for my sister and i live in Sacramento. They charged my card and delivered in less than 30 mins. I love having options when she is not near me. Thank you round table !

name: Steve Johnson
text: Awesome Huge cheeseburger, believe it or not, with homemade chips. This Round Table has upgraded to a Clubhouse with several screens w/sports , pub style and nice people. â€¦More

name: Marsel Swed
text: We came to this place and the the cashier her name is sara was so friendly and nice with that what give you good feeling about this place

name: Allison Dewar Cairns
text: Great food. Especially the sweet icing bread. Fun place too!

name: Michael Miller
text: The remodel is pretty good- I like the modern decor and the huge TVs for sports watching; we feel like we have  viable place to eat out on a Friday night on the ridge with the family instead of having to go to always go to Chico.  The â€¦More

name: Tammi Fabris
text: We had a great lunch date. Pizza was perfectly made. And the environment was fun.

name: Neville Smith
text: Food not bad service sucked.

name: easy draw &lps
text:
Very very slow.  Took more than an hour to get two burgers for my granddaughter & i.
While my son and date got theirs!   I don't  understand.
We pretty much by then just took home!

name: Mike Rux
text: Wanted to try this place for the first time. It was impossible to order anything. I called and asked for a delivery to magalia, he said they dont deliver here.  Ok fine right? Then i called back and asked if i could pay over the phone and â€¦More

name: Rick Pero
text: Always great pizza, busy hopping place on a Friday night! Good salad bar. Not much beer variety if you're not in to IPAs!!

name: Amanda Horton
text: Love them. Kind staff and yummy food. Our favorite spot.

name: H.L. A
text: Great food, prices are too high. Everything looks a lot better since they've re-done things.

name: Summer Look
text: Well- I'll start out saying the environment was awesome! Nice bar huge tvs and great place for kids to play. We ordered a salad a wombo combo and a pitcher of beer. Salad and beer just great...however sadly pizza was not good at all. The crust was under done and wet. We will stick with our local pizza spot here in Magalia.

name: Glenn Hartley
text: I really enjoy the new club house. Great micro  brew selection also a great place to watch sports now.

name: Lovely Rita
text: Im pregnate and at home with no vehicle. Roundtable waited until the delivery driver was leaving the store to call to tell me that they dont accept $100.00 bills. I wish this was mentioned on their website or that someone wouldve called â€¦More

name: Scott Lindsay
text: I have mixed feelings about this place.  The remodel attempted to make it "Applebees meets Chuck E Cheese", but the restaurant is simply not big enough to make it really work as it just feels cramped.  The arcade room is a nice idea, but is â€¦More

name: Dan & Leicia Wright
text: Called in my order 30 minute wait! No problem.  Got there 40 minutes later half my order was done.  5 minute wait turned into 15 minutes.  Terrible!

name: Jamie Pfister
text: Ordered online for delivery.  Waited over 45 minutes for a cold pizza.  Live 10 mins from restaurant. No delivery sleeve  for the pie, and $2.50 for a 20 oz Pepsi?Living in paradise, no delivery pizza should be cold. C'mon RTP... I had higher hopes.

name: The Real Skillman
text: Good food but a little pricey.  Great place to watch sports.

name: Nathan Hurst
text: The redone interior is fantastic, the service is great just a fun place to hang out.

name: Danielle Riess
text: Wow... I just called to make a pizza order had full bars on my phone and still she says can't hear you. Then, I asked about if you can switch toppings to make it the same price she says yes then I ask her how much it is and she says 19.. I â€¦More

name: Michelle Ashton
text: I live not even 10 minutes from Roundtable Pizza...ordered online  and it took about 45 minutes...the flatbread was cold and soggy and the blue cheese sliders had no blue cheese....Soooooo disappointed...Won't be ordering from them again...ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜

name: sean moran
text: Recently been remodeled and is now a good place to grab a beer, eat some food and watch the game.... or bring the family and play some games!

name: Marian West
text: They have great pizza & salad bar!!!

name: Eric Antze
text: Good service. They have games for the kids  and craft beer on tap.

name: Jim York
text: Best beer selection in town

name: Gregory Ferguson
text: Pizza is great but way over priced  $30,00 for a large pizza

name: Jim Leong
text: great chain store Pizzaria.

name: Ted Fox
text: Kinda over priced for the quality & service.

name: Barry LaVanway-Cutler
text: I love their pizza bit bummed they phased out pasta but I had dinner from there last night.

name: Tula Cope
text:
SAVE YOUR MONEY AND FRUSTRATION, THESE PEOPLE DON'T CARE
TIME FOR DELIVERY WAS 7:33PM...IT'S 7:50 PM AND THE GIRL ARGUED WITH ME ABOUT THE TIMEFRAME.  HERE'S THE PROOF YOU STUPID LITTLE NINNY.

name: matt roberts
text: Love the new bar.

name: Jolene King
text: Best salads around.

name: The local Illusionist
text: Good food great beer on tap

name: Rebecca Hughes
text: High prices and service is on the slow side

name: CHRISTINE D
text: Like the Clubhouse vibe.

name: patrick Luna
text: Great atmosphere!

name: aaron fried
text: This is where i fell in love with the Garlic twist. I miss this location.

name: Alberto Santana
text: Places looks a lot nice r

name: Gage Wiebelhaus
text: Good pizza place, lil expensive though

name: John Lord
text: Sometimes it can get crowded and noisy but the food is always great the one time we had an extended wait they gave us our pizza for free

name: Rob Ayers
text: Very popular, "Pub Style"

name: Dede Bowen
text: Absolutely delicious pizza
